apps.name: iNDS
apps.subtitle: Revival of the Nintendo DS emulator for iOS.
apps.versionDescription: Version 1.10.8 fixes the cover art system
apps.localizedDescription: iNDS is a derivation of the previous Nintendo DS apps for iOS, nds4ios and Nitrogen.

apps.name: Provenance
apps.subtitle: An iOS Frontend for Multiple Emulators
apps.localizedDescription:
Relive the golden age of gaming.

Provenance brings together a collection of classic gaming console emulators into a single app for your iPhone or iPad, with support for Apple Game Controllers for that authentic experience.

apps.name: UTM
apps.subtitle: Run virtual machines on iOS | Requires AltJIT / Jailbreak
apps.versionDescription: Please visit https://getutm.app/install for more details.
apps.localizedDescription: UTM is a full featured virtual machine host for iOS. In short, it allows you to run Windows, Android, and more on your iPhone and iPad.

apps.name: UTM SE
apps.subtitle: Run virtual machines on iOS | Doesn't require AltJIT / Jailbreak
apps.versionDescription: Please visit https://getutm.app/install for more details.
apps.localizedDescription: UTM is a full featured virtual machine host for iOS. In short, it allows you to run Windows, Android, and more on your iPhone and iPad.

apps.name: appdb
apps.subtitle: A fully-featured iOS client for appdb.to written in Swift 5
apps.versionDescription:
Custom developer identities are now detected correctly
Integrated new iOS 13 context menus, homescreen shortcuts & haptic feedbacks
Added pull to refresh to Featured tab
Added French translation (thanks to DzMohaipa)
Added Indonesian translation (thanks to Am1nCmd)
Added Javanese (Indonesia) translation (thanks to EskaseptianTeam)
Fixed bug where links were not clickable in News
Removed the (deprecated) option to link device via email
Various other minor fixes and additions
apps.localizedDescription: appdb is the successor of our old website named appaddict. appdb was formed when ex staff were concerned for the security of the users of our old website. appdb was setup using a new perspective of simplicity yet effectiveness. This formed our app-less approach and simple interface to install apps.

apps.name: Paperback iOS
apps.subtitle: An ad-free manga reader for iOS and iPadOS.
apps.versionDescription: Fixed for iOS 15 // Removed Patreon links
apps.localizedDescription: An ad-free manga reader for iOS and iPadOS.

apps.name: NineAnimator
apps.subtitle: A simple yet elegant way of waching anime on your favorite anime websites.
apps.localizedDescription: A simple yet elegant way of waching anime on your favorite anime websites. NineAnimator is a free and open source anime watching app for iOS and macOS. GPLv3 Licensed.

apps.name: iTorrent
apps.subtitle: An ordinary torrent client for iOS with Files app support.
apps.versionDescription: Patreon fix on iOS 14 // Libtorrent updated to 1.2.10
apps.localizedDescription: An ordinary torrent client for iOS with Files app support.
